casebody.data:
POLLOCK, Appellant, v. NEW YORK CENT. & H. R. R. CO., Respondent. (Supreme Court, General Term, Fourth Department. May 18, 1894.) Action by Charles A. Pollock against the New York Central & Hudson River Railroad Company.

Argued before HARDIN, P. J., and MARTIN and MERWIN, JJ.

No opinion. Judgment and order affirmed, with costs.
